name: Estée Lauder Double Wear Stay In Place Makeup
description:
Flawless, all-day wear. Buildable coverage. 60 shades. Discover the iconic Estée Lauder Double Wear Foundation, designed to handle anything life throws your way. This foundation offers a matte finish that looks fresh and flawless hour after hour, and always feels comfortable. It helps control oil, is water-resistant, and features SPF 10 to help protect skin.

 

Easily buildable from medium coverage to full, Estée Lauder Double Wear evens out skin tone and minimises imperfections, leaving you looking natural yet perfected. With up to 24 hours of colour-true wear, this long-lasting foundation will take you from desk to dinner and beyond - no touch-ups required.


What skin types is Estee Lauder Double Wear Foundation for?

This foundation is suitable for all skin types, and is especially popular on normal to oily skin as it lasts well and controls oil and shine throughout the day. 

The formula is oil-free, non-acnegenic and won’t clog pores, making it well-suited to anyone with acne-prone skin.


What else should I know about Estée Lauder Double Wear Stay in Place Makeup?

  • Buildable, medium coverage
  • Natural matte finish
  • Long-wearing for up to 24 hours
  • Waterproof
  • Heat-resistant
  • Pump available for purchase separately
  • Contains SPF10
  • Dermatologist-tested
  • Non-acnegenic, won’t clog pores
  • Oil-free
  • Fragrance-free
  • 30ml


How do I find my shade in Estee Lauder Double Wear Foundation?

Estée Lauder Double Wear is available in 60 shades, ranging from very light to very deep.

Find your shade with Findation, or read our guide to Estee Lauder foundation shades.


Estee Lauder Double Wear shade names indicate both undertone and colour depth - the higher the number, the deeper the shade. Cool shades are marked with a C, neutral shades with an N and warm shades are designated by N.


Cool (C) undertones: Skin has a pink or rosy tone, and tends to burn easily in the sun.

Neutral (N) undertones: Skin is more even toned, not overly pink or golden.

Warm (W) undertones: Skin is more golden or olive, and tends to tan easily in the sun.



How do I apply Estée Lauder Double Wear Foundation?

After cleansing skin and applying moisturiser, prep with a primer that addresses your skin concerns - we like Estée Lauder Futurist Aqua Brilliance Watery Glow Primer for dry or dehydrated skin, Perfecting Primer The Mattifier for oily skin, or Perfecting Primer The Illuminator for an extra dose of glow.

Shake the bottle well, and apply a small amount of foundation over skin, using either a makeup sponge, foundation brush or just your fingers. Start from the centre of the face and blend outwards, adding more to build coverage as needed.

Follow with concealer for any areas that need of a little extra coverage.

Estee Lauder Double Wear Foundation Tips:

To get a sheerer finish, try mixing in a small amount of Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair with your foundation before application. The hydrating serum gives skin lighter coverage and a more radiant finish.
